EURTRY.formula: usdmid = ((PF1_USDTRY_bid + PF2_USDTRY_bid)/2 + (PF1_USDTRY_ask + PF2_USDTRY_ask)/2)/2; return usdmid * ((PF1_EURUSD_bid + PF2_EURUSD_bid)/2)

GBPTRY.formula: const usdmid = ((PF1_USDTRY_bid + PF2_USDTRY_bid)/2 + (PF1_USDTRY_ask + PF2_USDTRY_ask)/2)/2; return usdmid * ((PF1_GBPUSD_bid + PF2_GBPUSD_bid)/2);
